markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ancestral Insight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2298) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 13 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have extensive knowledge of your ancestors' ancient origins. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Alghollthu Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) and Azlanti Lore. If you roll a critical failure on an [Alghollthu](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1) Lore or Azlanti Lore check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), you get a failure instead.
name: Ancestral Insight
